title: Ardent Censor's heals should be shown in end-game lobby
body:
Seriously, why isn't it shown under "healing done" ?

And while we're on the topic, shields and %reductions or stat increases on other champs should all be in a category named "Damage prevented"

replies.body: I commonly build Ardent Censer and have noticed that it usually does between 2k and 5k magic damage from an ADC with hurricane.  I know this because Twitch and Caitlyn have no other source of magic damage.  It heals by the same amount that it deals damage so I know that it heals the ADC by 2-5k.
They don't deal magic damage anymore. They are just a root and an auto attack amplifier.
Isn't her net magic damage though, or did they change that too?
because then you'd see kogmaw healed for more damage than was done by all 10 people combined and riot would have to admit they don't actually test anything they release
Kog'Maw can't use ardent censer to heal.  The stat would show healing done for his support just like it shows in game when you hover over it.
